content: MH-EMT45 Strut clamp Pre-assembled strut clamp with angled top and innovative design for easy attaching of tubing and pipes to strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- - - ### FEATURES:Features One piece, ready to use out of the box Sized for electrical metallic tubing Screw can be tightened at 45Â° angle for easy access Innovative design requires no nuts for fast and easy assembly Applications Mechanical piping systems - used to support and secure HVAC, plumbing, or other mechanical pipes within industrial or commercial buildings, ensuring they are held firmly in place within strut channels Electrical conduit installation - used for securing electrical metallic tubing (EMT) and other types of conduits to strut channels, particularly in environments where precise and stable alignment of electrical infrastructure is critical ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Clamping screw | 5/16-18 UNC | Tightening torque | 5 ft-lbf | Cross section width - b | 1-1/4 in ### ITEMS- 2008821 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMT45 1/2 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008822 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMT45 3/4 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008823 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMT45 1 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008824 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMT45 1-1/4 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008825 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMT45 1-1/2 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008826 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMT45 2 PG - Package Size 50 pc
